title: Battle Droid
description: From complex body transformation, to weapons, vehicles and mechanism, Battle Droid is the perfect companion to your awesome Robot / Droid character.
longDescription: Ask yourself a question, does a simple servo motor sound make your complex robot character sound good? The answer is absolutely not. As a seasoned sound designer I can tell you that what you need to make your Robot character to sound real, are a very well designed sounds transformation sequence, like a vehicle sound that isn't the classic metallic whoosh but instead an intelligent vehicle that come directly from the future, else a Droid body transformation so realistic that you can feel the power of the machine come directly from your speakers, or a futuristic weapon designed to be not only a bang noise, but instead an amazing plasma gun that you can feel that it's real from loading to fire! That is why I've spent time and resources to build Battle Droid. Battle Droid sound effects is a library that is designed to bring life to your Robot/Droid character. From complex body transformation, to weapons, vehicles and mechanism, Battle Droid is the perfect companion to your awesome Robot / Droid character.
